Class StatManager

java.lang.Object
nhltracker.StatManager
public class StatManager extends Object
The StatManager class acts as the business logic layer for the NHL Stat Tracker system.

It manages player statistics, interacting directly with the DatabaseHandler to perform CRUD operations. This class is used by both the CLI and GUI components.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StatManager(DatabaseHandler dbHandler)
    Constructor connects to the SQLite handler.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a player only if they don't already exist in the database.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player object to add
      Returns:
      true if the player was added successfully; false if a duplicate exists

    • getAllPlayers

      public List<Player> getAllPlayers()
      Returns all players currently stored in the database.
      Returns:
      a List of all Player objects

    • updatePlayer

      public boolean updatePlayer(String name, Scanner scanner)
      Updates an existing player's statistics through the CLI.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player to update
      scanner - a Scanner for reading new values from user input
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful; false otherwise

    • updatePlayerGUI

      public boolean updatePlayerGUI(String name, String newTeam, int newGoals, int newAssists, int newPlusMinus)
      Updates a player's statistics from GUI input fields.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player to update
      newTeam - the updated team name
      newGoals - the updated goal count
      newAssists - the updated assist count
      newPlusMinus - the updated plus/minus value
      Returns:
      true if the player was updated successfully; false if the player was not found

    • removePlayer

      public boolean removePlayer(String name)
      Removes a player from the database using their name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player to remove
      Returns:
      true if the player was removed; false if not found

    • searchByName

      public Optional<Player> searchByName(String name)
      Searches for a player by name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player to search for
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the player if found; otherwise, an empty Optional

    • filterByGoals

      public List<Player> filterByGoals(int minGoals)
      Filters players with goals greater than or equal to the specified minimum.
      Parameters:
      minGoals - the minimum number of goals
      Returns:
      a filtered List of Player objects

      Returns:
      a filtered List of Player objects
